title: Nicola Sirkis - Dans la lune
description:
Nicola Sirkis is the front man of the French band Indochine. While the band took a small rest from non stop touring and recording 1995 he released a solo record where he covered some of the musicians and bands who where the biggest influence on him and his career. This is the only solo record he made. This is not really Indochine for those who looks for that kind of music but more a layed back relaxed versions of different songs  in English and French. Its a really nice homage to some of the biggest artists and he does it with lots of respect and love. Its really worth listening to.

   1. Waterfront (David Sylvian)
   2. Mad World (Tears For Fears)
   3. Two Faces (Bruce Springsteen)
   4. Anne cherchait l&#039;amour (Elli & Jacno)
   5. Jusqu&#039;au trou du monde (Patti Smith, Jackson Song)
   6. Never Turn Your Back On Mother Earth (Sparks)
   7. What Is Life (George Harrison)
   8. Alice dans la lune (Young Marble Giant, Brand New Life)
   9. Play With Fire (Les Rolling Stones)

  11. Le Seigneur Des Toits (Tom Tom Club, On On On)
